title: One Day Workshop: NativeScript with Angular
descriptionHtml: This is a hands-on one-day NativeScript with Angular workshop that shows students the basic skills they need to design and build native mobile applications that function well on iOS and Android operating systems.

title: Comprehensive NativeScript with Angular Bootcamp
descriptionHtml: NativeScript Training Comprehensive NativeScript with Angular bootcamp teaches students the basic and advanced skills they need to design, build, and test sophisticated native mobile applications that function well on iOS and Android operating systems.

title: Introduction to NativeScript with Angular
descriptionHtml: Introduction to NativeScript with Angular course teaches developers with zero NativeScript and Angular experience how to start from scratch and develop a native application that will run on iOS and Android.

title: Advanced NativeScript with Angular
descriptionHtml: NativeScript Training Advanced NativeScript with Angular course teaches developers with some NativeScript and Angular experience how to take advantage of the frameworkâ€™s more sophisticated features.
